content.detailedDescription: Oct 31st 1977 i was about 10 years old.I had just come home from football practice.I was late coming home and all my friends had already been out for halloween.I went to catch up.I ran down my street vesper lane to the corner and made a left to start trick or treating.As i made the left and came down the street i saw in the sky heading from my left to my right a large glowing sun like ball in the sky moving over the nieghborhood.I stopped and watched.It disappeared over the trees.I ran back to my house never finishing going door to door because i was scared and didnt want to go down the street into the direction of the light
content.summary: I saw a large orange glowing moving object over our nieghborhood

content.detailedDescription:
Even more interesting is: during the past 4 nights i have observed a "wobbling star" in the sky. the same "star" that shines brightest, near the moon. 
 i live in tampa florida. please walk outside and see if you see this for yourself.
i have captured it on digital film, without a flash and you can clearly see erratic movement patterns. i have over 35 pictures posted, including some zoomed in, in which the wobbling motion is highly visible.  also,included are contrast shots including stationary buildings and the moon for a point of reference.

what are yall's thoughts on this? the bright star, near the moon, ... it's moving! (though mostly stationary) but absolutely moving unlike anything of our technology!!!
 
and no, it is not a satellite, or space probe. we lack the jet propulsionary capabilities for maneuvers like that. 




view these photographs on photobucket @ www.Photobucket.Com/ufotampa
content.summary: Is there such thing as bobbing "star"? zoomed photos show erratic motion pattern

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i had gone to the arts, beats & eats festival in pontiac michigan. they have 4 or 5 stages set up around the festival and bands are playing all the time. we had gone to see the band los lobos play and were sitting on the lawn to watch them. they had just finished playing and we both looked up at the sky because it was such a beautiful night. i caught my eye on what i thought was a balloon and pointed it out to my girlfriend. then i realized it wasn't a baloon. it was traveling east and as it was traveling, it was zig zagging...Real quick zig zags. i was mesmorized watching it and then it went behind a cloud. i looked at my girlfriend and without me saying anything, she says "i think we just saw a ufo". i started laughing because i was thinking the same thing. we waited for it to appear after the cloud moved but never saw it again.
content.summary: Saw ufo over pontiac michigan.

content.detailedDescription: Headed south on i75 just passed i675 seen directly in front of me one streak of fire headed in a southerly direction. it split into two streaks of fire then disappeared. then i looked to my left and there were 5 white arbs floating in random positions. the 2 on the bottom didnt move much but the other 3 moved, disappeared, reappeared and sometimes orbited on another. this lasted for about 5 min then they disappeared.
content.summary: 5 floating white lights and a streak of fire that split into 2

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went camping this past saturday. sunday morning,(august 30th) around 4:00, i woke up to go the the restroom. (there was a building near the campsites that provided restroom and shower facilities.) it was pitch black outside, except for the light from my lantern and the lights from the building. i went in, did my thing, and as i started to leave to walk back to my tent, i stopped because i felt there was someone behind me. i turned around and i saw three gray aliens standing in the woods behind the building, near another campsite on the hill in the back. they didn't seem to be doing anything but standing there. i thought it could have been the people from the campground on the hill, but why would they just be standing in the middle of the woods at 4am for no apparent reason?
when one of them turned and looked at me, i realized they weren't human. for one thing, the arms were too long and the bodies were too thin. their skin had a pale glossy look, and they had a very large cranium with lumps all over the top of the scalp. they had huge black eyes that seemed to pierce right through me. i stand 5'3" tall, and they looked about one or two inches shorter than me. the one that saw me started to inch toward me, but i bolted back to my tent. when my husband asked me what was wrong, all i could say was "there's (expletive) aliens back there!"when he finally calmed me down enough, he had me stay in the tent while he went to go see what it was. he found nothing. i don't know if i had any missing time or not. it was around 5:00 when i was finally calm enough to leave the tent, with my husband, of course. we had a cigarette and talked about my sighting. then around 6:00 we got a fire going and cooked breakfast. that's really all i remember from that morning. 
later that night,(i'm not sure what time it was. we kept waking up off and on.) he said he saw a shadowy figure move outside. he didn't hear any footsteps. he looked up and saw the top cover on the tent move, as if someone pulled it aside to look in at us from above. when we woke up again later that night, the blankets on his side of the tent were wet. (it started raining that night.) my side was dry for the most part. i can't remember exactly which campsite we used, but i'm pretty sure it was lot #60. it was located directly across from the parking lot. i didn't see any signs of a craft nearby, but i did see the creatures. i know what i saw was real, as i was wide awake when i saw them.
content.summary: Alien sighting in unicoi state park, ga.

content.detailedDescription:
While vacationing in baja mexico my husband was on the patio and saw a star-like object moving from the south to the north. at first he thought it was an airplane but after watching it there were no blinking lights. we vacation here alot and normally high altitude flights travel further east on a north or south route. this object for the first ten min was traveling slow to fast , then fast to slow in a northern heading. then suddenly turned to the north east and then preceded slow to fast for approx 2 minutes. then slowly turned a bright orange and slowly faded off into the distance. we thought it may have been a meteor or possibly "space junk".    the reason i'm contacting you is because of the abrupt movements and turns it made. my wife and i talked about it and came to the conclusion it was not a meteor, satillite or airplane, but something abnormal.  if you need more details please contact us at our email address.

                        thank you,
                           richard & janice bates
content.summary: Starlike  but changed to orange as it accelerated

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing me to go asleep when i watch to the sky and... it was over the sky. it was only 19 sec. but we can see about two fire balls like a big white light. one of them drive by itself to one place to another. when they disappear. anybody believe to me. but....I left this video for you.
content.summary: It was suddenly, and i went to take my cellphone to take the video.

content.detailedDescription: Me and the driver of the car were driving to a local store in our area and on route on the store i looked out the window of the passenger side and on a hill next to ak steel ( heading east at this time )on roosevelt  blvd.I along with the driver which was my mom looked up toward the moon cause it was so big and noticed several lights in a strange formation they were in a v shape. my mom was complaining about the other cars around us cause they kept stopping in front of us and we finally figured out that they were watching the same thing that we were. it was strange so we decided to try and go in the direction of these lights to see if we could tell more about them then all of the sudden they all scattered in different directions then disappeared. then all at once we saw airplanes coming in and circling around where we saw the other bright lights. after the airplanes were there the  other bright lights were scattered out away from where the planes were circling. the bright lights that we saw were moving up and down and from place to place to quick to be a regular plane. and when we spotted the planes we could tell from the red and blue lights on them that were the real planes . we both couldn't believe that we were seeing this strange sight and we really wanted to find out what it is. we still can't figure it out that it was so bright and one minute there in  one spot then a second later scattered. it was like  "wow, did you see that? ". we even came home and got my dad to go with us to try and see them . from the time we first spotted them it was just eerie and strange. was it ufo or military?...
content.summary: Typical v flight formation then scattering into mutiple objects and random colors

content.detailedDescription: We were drivung on i75 just past the tylersville exit in butler county ohio my husband pointed out the meteor looking thing we saw it was fiery red and orange with a sort of tail. then it burst into 3 parts then all of the sudden we saw what looked like 4 lights hovering, we pulled onto the side of th road to watch, they just hovered then they just all disappered as if they were never there. it was fascinating and may not be ufo related but wanted to report it just in case. we have not stopped talking about it, i even called my dad to tell him. i look forward to seeing if anyone else brings it up.
content.summary: Saw what looked like a meteor falling and then saw the lights

content.detailedDescription: We were drivung on i75 just past the tylersville exit in butler county ohio my husband pointed out the meteor looking thing we saw it was fiery red and orange with a sort of tail. then it burst into 3 parts then all of the sudden we saw what looked like 4 lights hovering, we pulled onto the side of th road to watch, they just hovered then they just all disappered as if they were never there. it was fascinating and may not be ufo related but wanted to report it just in case. we have not stopped talking about it, i even called my dad to tell him. i look forward to seeing if anyone else brings it up.
content.summary: Saw what looked like a meteor falling and then saw the lights.

content.detailedDescription:
During the time of my sighting of what i believe to be a ufo, i saw at my home, standing on my sidewalk and driveway in front of my house. i took my dog outside to go to the bathroom around 9:20/9:25. as she sniffed around my front lawn, i looked up at the sky to see several glowing red lights coasting through the sky above me. unlike anything i had ever seen, i watched for a few seconds while several more of these glowing red spheres passed over my neighboorhood, at one point there was a proccession of maybe 5 or 6 of these objects fly in a group. the first one of tese redlight fireball spheres i saw, i assumed it was a plane, but then realized as there were more and more appearing over a patch of trees, that these were in no way, shape, or form, merely airplanes.

i snapped a picture with my cell phone before racing back inside my house to let my dog in, and yelled for one of my parents to come check out what i was watching happen in the sky. i ran back to my driveway, and signaled by dad, who had come to the front door to see what all the comotion was, to come out side and watch. we both watched more than a dozen of these red glowing fireballs fly over our neighboor, then seemingly "disappear". my mom also had joined us by this time in the drive way. by the time this strange event was over, i had snapped 8 pictures of these flying objects with my cell phone.

my emotions during the sighting can be described as simply in aw of what i was watching. kind of a surreal feeling to be watching these things fly over my neighboorhood. after words, i started getting very curious about what i just witnessed, and broke out an old telescope and binoculours to look at the sky the rest of the night.
content.summary: Procession of red glowing spherical lights/fireballs

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the car, waiting on my family to return to the vehicle at the pittsburgh mills mall.. facing the entrance on the movie side (probably sw in general direction).

i had the sunroof of my car open.. i was just watching the clouds and happened to notice a dark circle, pea size in dimensions from the distance it was, maybe a little bigger.  

i figured the object to just be a balloon, but decided to take a closer look.  unfortunately i didnt have a high powered camera with me (zoom) or my camcorder, only an iphone, so i knew a photo wasnt going to work.

i had my binoculars with me and sat in the car observing this object for about 20 minutes.  through the binoculars it appeared to be shiny at times, then go semi-transparent, then more cylindrical.  i knew this wasnt a childs balloon at this point.  i was able to observe it for a great while, even still seeing it with the naked eye.

i am anxious to see if anyone else may have seen this or know what it might be... it could very well have just been a transparent weather balloon, perhaps the nws would have data and trajectory on anything released on this day?  if not a weather balloon then i am not sure.

based on angular size and the fact that the cloud deck was approximately 6500 feet.. the object was probably between 40 and 100 feet in size and guessing about 5000 feet high (not sure on the distance in front of me ground-wise, maybe the same)..  this is all a guess, my college physics is a bit rusty.
content.summary: Circular ufo seen above pittsburgh mills, transparent then shiny via binocs.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened about 50 years ago and i'm reporting this just to get it off my chest.  
my event happened in the late summer, early fall of 1959, when i was in the air force stationed at whellus ab, libya, north africa.  i was an airman second class, a radio intercept operator with the 6938th radio squadron mobile.  i had no experience with aircraft identification but did see fighter jet aircraft from europe which came down to use the gunnery range at whellus.  the only "strange" aircraft i saw was the british vulcan, which we watched taking off almost straight up.
anyway, another airman and i were walking back to the barracks after watching a movie on our side of the base (we had our own outside and indoor theatre inside a metal roof building).  i don't remember who he was but i wish i could.  
as we were walking back, a light flew over our heads and disappeared over the tree line.  total time was less than 15 seconds.  we both thought we had just seen "sputnik" or anothe satellite and commented as such.  no sound!  
that was until the bright light came back over the tree line travelling right to left and disappeared over the horizon.  that was a real suprise!
when we returned to our barracks, we asked other airmen if they had seen anything.  no.  we called the control tower and asked if they had seen anything.  no.  one other "strange" thing is time.  i don't know but someone said the time and we answered "no, it can't be that late."  just an aside but it is something i remember.
no idea how late is late and no idea what the time was.
thank you for listening.
raymond tompkins
content.summary: Lighted object came over our heads and disappeared over tree line.  surprised us when it came back awhile later.

content.detailedDescription: I am 28 years old now and back when i was about 17 my friend and i one very late night decided to go out on his back deck to look for satellites passing for we were quite bored.  on his back deck it overlooked the downtown kirkland area towards seattle.  it wasn't until about 45mins later that when we were overlooking the kirkland area that i saw what looked like a white ball moving quite fast heading north over kirkland horizontally (while i was seeing this and keeping my eyes on the ���target��� i ask my friend if he is seeing what i am seeing and he replied yes and continued watching) and then all off a sudden it started to speed up and then it multiplied and we now saw three or more objects now heading north horizontally like six times fast than when it first started off and then soon after disappeared.  right after that happened my friend and i decided to go inside for we were freaked out about what we just saw.  i am a very skeptical person and today i still don't believe in ufo's or anything of the sort but i still to this day can't figure out what the heck that was.  i am curious about people sighting but there is a big part of me that says they are full of it and i guess i still won���t believe until something more major i guess happens to me.
content.summary: Round like ufo that moved then multiplied and speed off

content.detailedDescription:
I am filling this report in for my friend, she witnessed th event. you need to speak to her really so she can explain what happened. she was very scared and concerend.

it was in oldham, greenfield. please contact her as she is very concerned and feel that someone should know about it.
content.summary: There was 30 objects.

content.detailedDescription: the video was set on the columbia river and a hologram dimension of lights revealed a mother spece craft and an attached craft with creatures with pumpkin heads with wires on top and long legs moving glowing balls onto the attached vessel picked up by it. they can use light andmimick any object. as you seem to be the foremost authority on this subject, are you affliated with the men in black as they are suspected of industrial sabotage as poteential espionage agents.
content.summary: Glowing balls collected by workers perhaps methane.

content.detailedDescription:
For the previous two nights i witnessed and filmed over a dozen orange and/or yellow orbs coming out of the woods in front of my valley.  having seen them before flying over our house on may 13, 2009 and coming up from that same area on may 18, 2009, i kept watching that area.  one after another came up from the woods, turned on what appears to be plane faa lights, then they speed up and fly off.  some appear to start flashing only out of nowhere higher up from this area without the orb appearance first.

knowing no one is believing this phenomenon is actually occurring, i looked on google maps to determine the best location of its origination.  that area is a patch of woods and trees at the edge of a private community golf course in jeannette, pa, just past the murrysville line where i live.
 
at dusk, i first took photographs of the area at 1600 iso with flash towards the area as i could see faint flashes.  those pictures reveal multiple orbs, several of which are orange or yellow (didn't look at them till next day).  i drove to the maintenance road by the golf course and could see pretty close an active plasma ball orb hovering above the golf course (and perhaps its pond--i never walked it to know for sure).  started shooting... it moved to the right behind some trees.  backed out of there and drove around to where the houses where to the highest point which was the job trailer (new community- not finished being built yet).  saw from opposite angle and started filming (so you can't say it's a plane's approach lights).  it did the usual transformation into a fake plane by starting blinking a colored light on each side of the big orb, which tones down into a headlight type appearance usually, then turns off to reveal what appears to be regular wing-tip navigation red/green lights with flashing white strobes.  as it flys over, the white strobes illuminate what, with the naked eyes, appears to be a tail.  upon blow up of each still of those flashes, however, the "tail" is a structure that changes and transforms a little between each flash.  this is not the first ufo i've filmed to do so, so i'm not surprised.
nasa has photos from sts88 mission on their website labeled as "space debris" that changes the same (link to those pictures on my youtube channel page:  seeingufospa)  several of those crafts are identifiable to those i am video taping.

the video is in hd and is viewed here:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=qgrz0vfvqiw

here is a couple of stills--first two of the orb and its fake plane appearance (one of many) and the third is just one of the many i saw after that (over a dozen total).

they only seem to be most active from monday night through thursday night--not much activity usually on weekends, but i suppose with the increase in sightings lately... that could change.
content.summary: Jeannette:  plasma orb turns into fake plane "ufos & other shapes

content.detailedDescription: I have a wild game camera set up on some property that i hunt on. it is set to go off about every 12 minutes after 3 pictures have been taken. i have had this camera set up watching my feeder for about 3 months and the camera has taken over 1,000 pictures. when i checked out one set of pictures looking to see wild game i came across 9 pictures that appeared to have some sort of light that was in the air and it was there while a wild boar was around the feeder. the light never changed it's plane and didn't seem to bother the boar. the light started from right to left coming up an old path that comes from a creek. the first set of pictures shows the light coming from behind a branch, thus showing that it couldn't be on the front of the camera, also there are times when it is close to the camera and you can see a definite size difference by measuring the size of the object. the location of the camera is such that a hill is behind the deer feeder so that there is no way that a light source from a road or plane might be the cause. the first set of three pictures starts at 11:05 and ends at 11:05 the second set of three pictures starts at 11:17 and ends at 11:18 the third set of three pictures starts at 11:28 and ends at 11:29. when i first started to look at the pictures i almost deleted the pictures but then i noticed the light. i tried to figure out what the picture might be but i just couldn't explain what the light could be. after showing the picture to several people not one person could explain the lights. i have done a lot of research on the internet and have not been able to find anything that looks anything like this light. th fact that the boar is around the entire time really puzzles me because they spook easily. the size of the light appears to be about the size of a bowling pin. unfortunately i personally never see the light so i can give no personal testimony. i am going to attach 2 pictures with the light and one picture in daylight without for review.
content.summary: Appears to be lit, cylinder about the size of a skinny bowlingpin

content.detailedDescription: I got home from mohegan sun at about 4:30 am and im pulling into my driveway. across the street from my house over the eastern horizon i saw 2 extremely bright lights like 20 times brighter than a normal star. i got out of my car and sat in my front yard watching them and i could see they were moving ever so slightly back and forth i thought i was seeing things and a few times the objects appeared to move closer to me getting much brighter. it was nuts at one point one the the object which seemed the closest to me the entire time got unbeleivably bright and looked like it was moving towards me pretty low in the sky and i actually got scared and got out of the chair i was sitting in and started walking towards my house. then a 3rd and forth similar looking bright light appeared in a different location. they were all almost sliding around the sky not really moving in a certain direction. every few minutes the lights would fade out then reappear even bighter than before. this is the 4th or 5th time ive seen something like this in the same location in the past 3 weeks. everytime ive seen these objects they get more dramatic, i was baffled thinking of someone i could call that late to go outside and check this out. i seriously want someone to set up a camera crew and videotape this footage in the next week or so its unbelievable. i live surrounded by farms in a real rural area and the whole event lasted till about 5:40 am right when the sun started to come up thats when the lights faded out. at that point i literally looked up to scan the sky and saw like 5 star like lights moving westerly in the sky above zig zagging. and another thing it was a partly cloudy night and these light were infront of the clouds they didnt block out the light which makes me think they were really close.
content.summary: 3-5 bright white lights appearing then dissapearing and moving in a controlled but erratic motion

content.detailedDescription:
the events involve many abductions over a 3 year period.  i have never seen a ufo per say, and i believe this is intentional.  why?  i can only guess the reason is they don't want me to categorize them.  there are many accounts of ships and how they are associated with various species.  my only conclusion is they want to hide their origins or if you like the faction they belong to.

  the first abduction i recall was vague, and at first i believed it was merely a dream.  i would like to mention that over the years i have never been able to recall my dreams very well, and if i do the memory of them fades quickly.  these however are vivid, and the memory of them persist years later.  

  the first abduction i recall i was sitting at a round table with other people surrounding it.  an adult male in his 40s asked me if i would join them.  i replied 'join what, what is it you want me to join?'  he more or less broke it down and described them as a group of decision makers.  from his description the impression i got was that they were a think tank.  when i asked if they were a think tank he laughed and said 'sort of'.

  he then ask a few people at the table to describe to me what their responsibilities were.  he asked a very young look girl sitting on his left to describe her "job".  it consisted of making sure that people were happy and had fun things to do that made them happy.  i suppose someone in charge of moral.  i replied that i liked that, and it seemed to please her a great deal.  he then ask another woman sitting three chairs to his left to describe her responsibility.  it consisted of something like an efficiency officer.  she more less described something like insuring maximum productivity at all costs.  now i use that description, because it is hard for me to describe exactly what it is she does.  my visceral reaction to what she said, was 'that is fascist!'  this seemed to anger her, and she acted a bit put out.  there is more to the abduction and borders on the fantastic, but what i did account more or less covers the event.


  another abduction involved me waking up with 2 beings standing over me on either side.  the one on my left looked to the other one and asked 'is he waking up?' all i saw were vague shapes, with a sort of halo effect around their heads.  like intense lighting from above.

  i was laying on my back, and didn't appear to be strapped down or anything.  i went back to sleep at that moment.  this is the moment that permeated every incident after that.  i realized i was not asleep and from a subconscious to a conscience level i realization that i was awake and not alone.  in the back of my mind i conceptualized how i should react.  'how i should react to someone doing something to me without my permission?'

  my reaction was to choke the person on my right.  i reached up and made contact with someone's chest.  i was surprised and preceded to feel this person next to me.  it felt artificial and yet organic at the same time.  to try and articulate what i felt it was like pot marks.  these were not crude pot marks like scaring, it was more like organized pores.  the person did not stop me or even flinch.  i felt enough to realize whoever it was was humanoid and then proceeded to try and choke them.  the throat felt like there was nothing underneath, just some sort of skin covering a void.  after that i fell back asleep.


  the next abduction involved me waking up to a man asking me questions.  i am going to omit the questions simply because they are frightening and i don't think they will be understood.  needless to say i reacted obstinately.  if you knew me you would understand.  i replied angrily that they should be doing something a different way.  and all he replied was if they could do it the way i described, that they wouldn't need to do the other.  so i said 'don't you think that is what you need to be working towards?'  a large person sitting on my right kind of looked back at me worried.  from what i gathered he was an abductee as well.

*to note, during these abductions my vision was obscured.  by that i mean blurred.  not to the point of totally blurring my vision, just enough to make it hard to make out detailed features.  although i don't recall specific events about my dreams, i never experienced something like this.

  there were many abductions after these and at one point i held conversations with one in particular.  they told me things, some i believe to be true and others i am not so sure about.  they played on my assumptions and clearly saw me as inferior.  now that is not to say they didn't like me, i got the feeling they saw me as cute.  i appears that their 'attachment' to humanity seems to run deeper than superficial.

  a few of the things they told me?  well, they claimed their species is 30 billion years old.  when i replied in astonishment that our current universal expansion was only 15 billion years old they laughed and said 'we know'.  they said that they are very similar to us socially... love, family, culture, even crime.  needless to say i was floored.

  i am not the only person to have been abducted and experienced something like this.  i am not special, i am just one of millions on earth who have been contacted.  there are others on earth who have had the same thing happen to them, and are afraid to repeat it.  although some are not and have bravely come forward and recounted their experience.  i applaud these brave people.

  the aliens clearly asked me not to mention this to anyone, and in reality i haven't recalled even a quarter of my experience.  whether they were concerned about how i would be perceived by my peers or merely didn't want their existence to be known, i am not sure.  i suspect it is the later.  they want to keep their presence hidden, that much is clear.  and when i told them i wouldn't keep my mouth shut about it, they didn't seem surprised.  i told them if they really didn't want me to say anything they might as well kill me now.  needless to say i am still here and do not fear them.

  i saw six different species and interacted with four of them.  now i know our universe is more diverse and wonderful than we ever imagined.  i do not expect people to believe me.  it doesn't matter, i know in my heart and mind that what i experienced was real and i will never forget it.
content.summary: Numerous abductions

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 8pm when i was driving down i-80w towards pinole when i noticed a bright glowing object heading northeast. from far away the blinking lights were similar to a jetliner except much brighter. however i noticed that the frequency of the blinking was much faster than a normal plane. at one point the object got close enough to see that the strobing white light was giving off an immense star-like glare effect. it was difficult to make out the shape of the object because it was getting dark, however the 4 lights on it indicate it was a rectangular shaped object, with the longer side moving forward. the four lights from left to right were white, red, white and red. the first white light was incredibly bright while the remaining three were much less so. also, i'm not 100% sure but i think the white and red lights were alternating. i lost sight of the object as it flew past over hercules. about 5 seconds after, i spotted a normal plane flying along the same path with normal navigation lights and the difference between the lightning was quite distinct.

the placement of the lights on the object makes this seem very much like the wings on a plane. however, i only took particular notice of this because of just how bright the light was. does anyone know what this may have been?
content.summary: Super bright pulsating ufo seen on i-80w

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sailing out on klamath lake enjoying the beautiful hot weather, it was getting dark, so we decided to find a cove and anchor the boat and have a late dinner..When we noticed 2 lights in the sky,one was orange and one was green, we realized they werent lights but discs..So i ran below to get my camera so i could take some pictures, by the time i got back up on deck about 2 minutes later, they were gone..I really wish i could have gotten a picture..They were gone as fast as we had noticed them...
content.summary: My boyfriend and i were out sailing on the klamath lake, we saw 2 discs one green and one orange.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 8:00 pm i'm at the computer looking out the front window.  in the east s/e sky i see what looks like a bright star.  it was 45 to 50 degrees up from the horizon.  you hardly ever see stars here in eureka, so i watched it for 15 minutes, and it was moving very slowly first a bit to the right, then a bit to the left, etc.  i went outside to view it.  it actually looked like two objects, one on top of the other.  after 40 minutes it had slowly moved south behind a redwood tree, out of my sight.  i tried to find a number for mufon, but was unsuccessful, so i called nuforc.  the yo-yo i spoke with told me it was jupiter.  now, i'm not an astronomer, but there's no way that was jupiter. jupiter doesn't move that fast, and even if it did, it doesn't go south, north, and south again.  it wasn't an airplane, helicopter, blimp, or satellite, of that i'm positive.  it was moving too slow to be anything i'm familiar with, but too fast to be a planet or star.  i'll watch to see if it ever comes out from behind the tree, and if it does, i'll send in another report.
content.summary: Bright; shaped more vertical than horizontal

content.detailedDescription: At 10:04 pm tonight we were having a bonfire with kids and out of thin air a huge orage pulsing , glowing stationary object appeared. an aprroximate guess would be that the ufo was 8 miles out and 6-10 thousand feet altitude when it apeared. it then started slowly going west then very quickly it went from 8 miles away from us to 35-50 miles away in about 3 seconds flat,and then was gone, faster than anything commercial or military. like think about mach 3,4 jets are fast,this object was going mach 12-15 at minimum. it headed toward linden michigan. linden has an airport and flint bishop intl (fnt) is 12 miles north of us,linden airport is 3 miles south west of us, so with that being said theres a good chace radar at these two airports picked this ufo up on radar at 10:04 this evening.
content.summary: Large bright object  appears hovers then takes off fast

content.detailedDescription: I was watching t.V. one night on sep. 18, 2003. frist let me explain that i live in rockaway, where planes fy over my area day and night but on this night there where no planes. i wondered why there won't any noise from the planes. i went and stood on my balcony and saw a large what look like the  sun but it was a  ball that seemed to  falling into the water at the beach and on the right side there seem to be the moon. i ran back into the apt to get my camara. if you enlarge some 0f the pictures you will see something that looks like tear drops and something that looks like it flying across the sky. i put the pictures on a cd. i also send them to my sister and brother. my sister was afraid and told me to destory the pictures but i needed  answers so i kept the cd. my brother was shocked at the pictures but he was at a lost for words. i even emailed the newpaper out here called the wave but no one ever contacted me. i was afraid so i took as many pictures as i could and i ran back into the house and called my sister and brother. i also notice that on some of my pictures the time and dates are wrong.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: I can only ask you to look at the pictures i have enclosed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on our front porch when i happened to look up and see a silver sphere in the sky about 800 to a 1000ft in the air. i thought at first it was a baloon but noticed that it never moved even though there was a good breeze blowing at the time. i observed it for about 15 minutes when an airliner passed overhead and i noticed the object was between myself and the jet,thats when i got a good ideah of the size of the object floating in the sky. i went inside to get a camera and as soon as i brought it up to take a photo it literally shot off at such a high speed i could not even begin to calculate it. the object was approximately 10ft in diamter and appeared to be rotating,the surface also appeared to be like liquid silver. when it disappeared i knew that i had observed a ufo for the first time in my life and i was quite thrilled.
content.summary: Silver rotating sphere about 10ft in diameter floating in one position for the duration of 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car after picking up some lunch, when i happend to look to the sky, and notice the object. i went into my girlfriend's house and immediately asked for her camera but unfortunately it would not focus on the object, she did however come out and witness the same thing that i saw. all i can say is that it looked like a star, but it was broad daylight high noon, but closer than a star like in our upper atmosphere, we watched for about ten minutes until a cloud passed in front of it and then it was gone. it didn't do anything fancy just kinda hovered there in the same spot, but literally disappeared from one minute to the next.
content.summary: Stagnent ball of light looked like a star but in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were driving north on the maine turnpike near wells when we witnessed a strange sighting of lights. we came over a rise and could see a singular bright light, rather large, hanging low in the sky to left of the highway's south bound lane (due west). as we approached we could see it was not moving but hovering a good 700-1000 ft (estimate) in the air. as we came upon it we could hear no noise of a helicopter since all the windows/sunroof were open and we slowed a bit to look at the light. as we began to pass by the lights we could clearly see three red lights forming a visual isosceles triangular shape with the bright white light in the middle with an erratic set of smaller lights flashing on one "side" in white. the lights themselves had an odd way of being bright yet not illuminating the hull of whatever it was attached to - hard to explain.  i really couldn't tell if other cars could see it but it would have been nearly impossible to miss. our return trip home during the day proved there were no radio tower lights in the area. 

interestingly we saw another set of lights very similar but much lower to the ground on near the hampton, nh tolls last year in august. the array of lights were also triangular and much more craft revealing (dark greyish) being a scant 500ft off the ground (estimate). many more lights were seen on this sighting attached to the craft. again, no radio tower nearby.

both accounts have been also reported at nuforc.

as a side, i am also the deputy news editor at the anomalist (website) so i am very familiar with the "black triangle" phenomena seen by thousands of people.
content.summary: Large triangular lights, low to ground, off of maine turnpike.

content.detailedDescription: I met a co-worker at a nearby irish bar not far from where we work in downtown seattle. we sat outside as it was a warm and sunny summer day. i had only 2 or 3 drinks from my beer when i sat back into my chair to relax and take in the nice afternoon. i looked up at the blue sky and surrounding buildings, one of which is a still in construction 40 story high rise condo development only one block east of where we were sitting, when i noticed a white object to the left (north) of the new building. what caught my attention was that it was not moving, stationary. for a moment, i thought it was something attached to the building, like a string of balloons perhaps. however, upon further observation, i realized it was not a string of balloons, but something else entirely. it was an object triangular in shape, white, and upon further observation, moving slowly to the south. i pointed out the object to my friend asking "what is that"? we both observed the object as it slowly moved south, becoming hidden behind the new building. i need to add the fact that the object also seemed to change shape from what we originally observed as triangular. it seemed to "morph" into a nondescript shape; maybe roundish, oval or kind of circular, then back to triangular, then back to whatever shape and so on. it also seemed to have a strange and very faint, fuzzy "filter", so to speak, surrounding the object which made it all the more difficult to discern the shape(s) of. both my friend and i commented about this observation. it was as if it, the "filter", was meant to obscure, or blur ones vision, and that is what it felt like too, oddly enough. the height of the building is 40 stories in total, and the object appeared to be at an altitude of perhaps 15 to 20 stories up and approximately only 3 to 5 blocks behind (to the east) of the building. two other patrons were outside as well and we pointed out the object to them when one of them stated "that's something you don't see everyday in seattle", and that was about it for their interest in the object. however, my friend and i were very intrigued by this point, and lamented for not having binoculars handy. at any rate, the object moved slowly from view behind the building. we sat back down, continued on our beers all the while looking for when the object would reappear from behind the right (south) side of the building. 5 maybe 10 minutes went by when i noticed the object was now above the building, and still exhibiting the same strange shape morphology. the object now seemed to travel on a very slow south-west direction toward the puget sound. it also appeared to slowly gain altitude as well. in fact, the object remained on this direction and altitude gain until we could no longer see it. the total observation time was approximately 20 minutes. the objects' size is difficult to discern;i'd say maybe the size of a compact car.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Daylight ufo sighting from downtown seattle.
